document.docAuthor: Stekolshchikov, Andrey V. & Buga, Sergey V.
document.masterDocTitle: The aphid fauna (Hemiptera, Sternorrhyncha, Aphidomorpha) of Murmansk province (Russia), with description of Aphis khrulevi sp. nov. and Dysaphis karyakini sp. nov. and males of Chaitophorus nigricantis Pintera, 1987

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The aphid fauna (Hemiptera, Sternorrhyncha, Aphidomorpha) of Murmansk province (Russia), with description of Aphis khrulevi sp. nov. and Dysaphis karyakini sp. nov. and males of Chaitophorus nigricantis Pintera, 1987

subSubSection.paragraph:
Published information. Ap :
Brassica oleracea L. Aphids
were recorded in 1935 on the cabbage seedlings brought from Leningrad (at present St. Petersburg ) ( Znamenskaya, 1962 ), no other records are known.

Published information. Kir :?
Angelica
sp. ( Fridolin, 1936 ). LRP :
Anthriscus sylvestris (Stekolshchikov, 2012)
. Material. Luv :
Anthriscus sylvestris
, 17.vii.2002 , apt.; Cenolophium denudatum , 30.vii.2002 , apt.; Ligusticum scothicum L., 6.vii.2005 , apt. ( AS +ESh). LRP :
Anthriscus sylvestris
, 4.vii.2005 , imm. [8. vii.2 0 0 5, apt.] ( AS ).

Published information. PABG :
Salix
aff. fragilis L. ( Buga, 1999 ). LRP and LRCh :
Angelica archangelica
L. (Stekolshchikov, 2012).

:

L., 26.vii.1962 , apt. and al. (GSh). Luv : sweeping, 21.viii.1993 , gyn. ( AP ). Luv : light trap, 13.vii.2003 , al. (ESh). LRCh :

, 28.vi.2004 , em. ( AS ). LRP :

, 6.vii.2005 , em. and imm. [ 8–14.vii.2005 , apt.] ( AS ).
